name: Bust'n Redzta
description:
Bust'n Redzta was designed by Brent Silby in 2002. It was coded in Javascript, which was unusual at the time, given that most browser games in that era were written in Flash.  It is a pleasant, arcade themed platform game.

Use arrow keys and Z to jump. Guide Redzta through 13 levels of bubble popping platform action. Avoid the Dinos and you will be fine.
